creditline: Gift of Willard and Elizabeth Clark
description: bird with turquoise back and white belly, perched on one leg on a diagonal stump; silhouettes of leaves and curving branches at bottom and right; two black characters and red seal, LRQ
inscription:
Inscription and Stamp

on back, in pencil: [5200001] and [Plover]
markings: on back, stamped in black: [MADE IN JAPAN]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Lapwing on Tree Stump
